What a shameless fellowl He has not paid yet, though lie ought to have done sol on the first of January, especially as he has freed himself from enon-mous debts by the handwriting of Faberius and has sought help from the goddess of help.1 For 1 must have my joke, that you may not think 1 am seriously concerned.
